div.head: 火燒成瘡
div.div: sores generated by burns from fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sores generated by burns from fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Xiao pin fang 小品方 10: 治火燒成瘡方。白 糖燒灰粉之 , 即燥，易瘥 , “Recipe to cure sores generated by burns from fire : Burn bai tang to ashes and apply them externally. This will dry them. A cure is easily achieved”.
